mapper.select: select * from item order by idx
select * from item where itemcategory= #{itemcategory} order by idx

select * from (select rownum rnum, IDX, ITEMNAME, ITEMCONTENT, ITEMLEVEL, SALE, ITEMPRICE, ITEMCOUNT, ITEMCATEGORY, URL, ISDEL from ( select * from ITEM where itemlevel = 2 order by idx)) where rnum >= #{f} and rnum <= #{s}

select * from (select rownum rnum, IDX, ITEMNAME, ITEMCONTENT, ITEMLEVEL, SALE, ITEMPRICE, ITEMCOUNT, ITEMCATEGORY, URL, ISDEL from ( select * from ITEM order by idx desc)) where rnum >= #{f} and rnum <= #{s}
mapper.update: UPDATE ITEM set ITEMNAME = '#{itemName}', ITEMCONTENT = '#{itemContent}', ITEMLEVEL = '#{itemLevel}', SALE = '#{sale}', ITEMPRICE = '#{itemPrice}', ITEMCOUNT = '#{itemCount}', ITEMCATEGORY = '#{itemCategory}', URL = '#{url}' WHERE idx= #{idx}
